InfluenceRule.name: Initiator is introverted.
Initiator wants to pick on the responder
Initiator wants to pick on the responder

Initiator wants to pick on the responder
Initiator wants to pick on the responder
Initiator is vengeful
Initiator is vengeful
Initiator is vengeful
*** R did someting lame to I int he recent past and i annoys them for it.
*** I in secure and has strong feelings for R who they used to date but they don't date any longer
Initiator is deep
Initiator is deep

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %list(i,r,and)% kept saying hey to each other for some reason
%i% tried to annoy %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% chill about it
%r% refused to be annoyed by %ip% stupid jokes
%i% failed to guess the number %rs% %pron(r,was/were)% thinking of
%i% made %r% jealous about hanging out with %pron(r,his/her)% %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%i% tried and failed to mess with %rp% head about being friends with %pron(r,his/her)% %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%list(i,r,and)% tried to get %o% to choose between %list(i,r,us/them)%
%list(i,r,and)% couldn't see eye to eye about %o%
%i% kept saying %rp% name over and over again
%i% tried to annoy %r% without any luck

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey! Hey! Hey

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Want Something Won't Give it up Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hey- I heard you have a %toc1%.
Can I see it? Can I see it? Can I see it? Can I see it?
Hey %sweetie%! Who's my %sweetie%?
Yes you are! Yes you are! I just want to cuddle and tickle and snuggle you all day long!
Hey! Hey! Hey
Hey %r%, did I ever tell you about how much I hate %toc1%s?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, but I'm afraid you're about to.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: OMG you have no idea. Like %toc1% culture is so full of fail. You don't even know. I saw this %toc1% website and I was like R U serious?! There are people out there who are FANS of %toc1%s?
And then I went into this forum and I was like WTF is wrong with you %toc1%-loving weirdos? And they were like STFU GTFO! And I was like...

Instantiation.name: Annoy - This Time Its Personal Won't Shut Up Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, did I ever tell you about how much I hate %toc1%s?
OMG you have no idea. %toc1% culture is so full of fail. I saw this %toc1% website and I was like R U serious?! There are people out there who are FANS of %toc1%s?

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Won't Shut Up About Something Lame Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%! I saw the lamest thing today. Some %pejorative% has a %toc1% sticker on his backpack!
%gender(r,Dude,Man)% it was SOOOO lame. I was like you have got to be kidding me.
And then I was all like, where did you get that, the %pejorative% shop? And they were all like...
%greeting%! Hey, have I ever told you about how awesome %toc1%s are?
Cause yeah, there was like this %toc1% special on TV last night, did you see it? SOOO %positiveadj%. I was like, WOAH, this is EPIC.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, please go bother someone else with your stupid %toc1% fan%gender(i,boy,girl)% rant. %toc1%s are for %pejorative%s.

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Too Good a Day Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, %r%! Guess what?
Chicken butt.
That's all.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This is such a beautiful day. I'm not going to be annoyed by anything today. Peace be with you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%! Hey, did you know I can read your mind?
Yes! I bet I know exactly what you're thinking right now!

You're thinking %random(I can't really read your mind,you've never seen a magician as attractive as me,that last meal at the school cafeteria really isn't agreeing with you,thin,about Abraham Lincoln,about Prom)%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Actually, I was thinking how totally %random(lame,stupid,dorky,idiotic)% you are.

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Magic Trick Reject because so cool

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! I've been looking for you! I think you have something of mine.
Oh, just this COIN THAT WAS TOTALLY BEHIND YOUR EAR!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OMG! How'd you do that? You're so cool!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Magic,It's all in the wrist,A magician never reveals the tricks of the trade,I know)%.

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Guess the Number Magic Trick Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, %r%, come here! Watch this. Think of a number between one and ten.
Oh. It wasn't four?

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Being Friends with R's significant other - Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.
You know what is *so* good? Being friends with your %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.
Doesn't that just make you so jealous that we are hanging out all the time...
Without you...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I never want to see you around my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)% again.

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Being Friends with R's significant other - Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.
Oh, just wanted to mention that I love being friends with your %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.
We do stuff that %pron(o,he/she)% would never do with you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sure we do plenty of things together that you wouldn't even dream of.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But, aren't you jealous of our eternal friendship bond?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not really. Now get out of here.

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Annoying the enemy that is hanging out with I's significant other

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.
Since you seem so content to waste my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%'s time, now I'm going to waste yours.
%pron(r,He/She)% started it.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Your %gender(i,boyfriend,girlfriend)% is jealous of our friendship and is being a douche.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: OMG seriously, can't you both grow up? I don't want to have to pick between the two of you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Be friends with *%pron(i,him/her)%*? No way. You're going to have to choose.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Pretty much.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Oh, that's my phone going off. Gotta take this call, super important, talk to you guys later.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm watching you. Stay away from my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.

Instantiation.name: Annoy - Annoyed that friend doesn't like BF/GF

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. What the hell is your beef with %o%? %gender(o,He,She)%'s my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend, I wish you'd treat %gender(o,him,her)% with a little more respect.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I'm sorry, *%buddy%*. I wasn't aware being friends with you required me to be in love with everyone you've ever had a fling with.
I'll be nicer to that %pejorative% %o% when %pron(o,he/she)% apologizes to me for all the hell %pron(o,he/she)%'s put me through this year.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see. So being the bigger %gender(r,man,person)% isn't an option?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This conversation is over. Have fun with your love monkey, %i%.
%random(Shut up and go away.,Very funny.,This is stupid.,Grow up.,Why don't you shut your face?)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, %random(do you want to hear the most annoying sound in the world?,would you like to be poked ten thousand times?,want to hear the stupidest joke in the universe?,pull my finger.,want to see how long I can hold my breath?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(No thanks,That's okay,Not today)%, %buddy%, I'll pass. %random(But thanks for asking!,Have a nice day!,You take care now.,Catch you on the flip side.)%
